magpie.models.classification

Class SplitClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.models.BaseModel
      • magpie.models.SplitModel
        • magpie.models.classification.SplitClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AbstractClassifier, MultiModel, Citable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable

    public class SplitClassifier
extends SplitModel
implements AbstractClassifier
    Model that uses several other models to model different parts of a dataset.

    How to Use this Class

    Use this class in the same way as you would use any SplitModel.

    Usage: *No options*

    See Also:

      • setModel

        public void setModel(int index,
            BaseModel x)
        Description copied from interface: MultiModel
        Set a specific submodel. Will increase number of models if necessary.

        Any implementation should not clone the model. This will allow people to construct a model used already-trained models.

        Specified by:
        setModel in interface MultiModel
        Overrides:
        setModel in class SplitModel
        Parameters:
        index - Index of submodel to be set
        x - Model to be used (creates a clone)
